messages.subject: Something good in New York
messages.msgSnippet: One good thing about New York:  It s close to Dean Sluyter, one of my very favorite authors ever, so if any of you are near enough and have the inclination and
messages.messageBody:
One good thing about New York: It's close to Dean Sluyter, one of my very
favorite authors ever, so if any of you are near enough and have the
inclination and logistics to make this, go and tell me about it! And if
you're interested in looking at sample passages from two GREAT books, look
here: www.cosmicbook.com

---------------

Hi, Folks . . .

I have two events coming up at New York Open Center,
83 Spring St. For a full description and registration
information, please click on the links below. (You can
also phone 212.219.2527.)

FRIDAY, FEB. 1, 8:00 P.M. - EVENING TALK
Would the Buddha Carry a Palm Pilot:
Finding Balance in a Complex World
http://opencenter.org/wouldthebuddha.htm

SATURDAY, FEB. 2, 10 A.M.-5:30 P.M. - WORKSHOP
The Zen Commandments:
Ten Suggestions for a Life of Inner Freedom
http://opencenter.org/zencommandments.htm

I'd love to see you there!

Sincerely,
Dean

P.S. Please feel free to pass this information along
to friends.

=====
1423 Watchung Ave., Plainfield, NJ 07060
908.561.0462 908.647.5555 x 1348
www.cosmicbook.com
